Package xbrlcore.instance

Class Summary
Fact This class represents a Fact within an XBRL instance document as it is described by the XBRL 2.1 Specification, which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/.
Instance This class represents an XBRL instance document as it is described in the XBRL 2.1 Specification, which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/

InstanceContext This class represents a context within an XBRL instance document as it is described in the XBRL 2.1 Specification which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/.
InstanceFactory This class is responsible for creating an Instance object of an instance file.
InstanceOutputter This class creates the XML structure of an Instance object.
InstanceUnit This class represents a unit of an instance file as it is described in the XBRL 2.1 Specification which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/.
InstanceUnitFactory This class creates some basic units often needed in instance files.
InstanceValidator The purpose of this class is to do some basic instance (XBRL) validation.
